body: Basic building blocks of CMOS design, design rules, chip planning, layout design, system power and timing, simulation of VLSI structures.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPEN371 or CMPEN471 ; E E 310)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPEN 411: VLSI Digital Circuits
